name: LensPlay
desc: LensPlay is a decentralized, mobile-first video-sharing application built on top of the Lens Protocol. Its main objectives are to provide a focused and streamlined experience for users, simplify the content creation process for creators, and attract more content creators to the Lens Ecosystem.

name: DevSpace
desc: DevSpace is a webapp where user can showcase their projects and get feedback from various users.

name: LensWrap
desc: LensWrap shows users followers,posts,comments, nfts, mirros and collects by using lens handle.

name: DevStuff
desc: DevStuff is a webapp where you can find illustrations, icons and vectors which are provided by various sites.

name: MetaMusic
desc: Blockchain based app where user can upload music and get minted NFT opensea. User can give tip to the other users and hear all song uploaded by different users.

name: Google Clone
desc: Google Clone UI with searching ability built using ReactJS.

name: Facebook Clone
desc: Facebook Clone with login and upload posts or photos. Built using ReactJs and Firebase.
